title: Noam Chomsky - 2004-06-07 - Ronald Reagan's Legacy - Interview on Democracy Now!
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound and picture quality.

On June 7, 2004, Noam Chomsky appeared by phone on Democracy Now! to speak about former President Ronald Reagan's legacy.


De-noised and EQed to sound better than the original broadcast. 



Despite what the host Amy Goodman says, Chomsky did not return after the commercial break.


Tags:


Chomsky, 2004, Reagan, Amy Goodman, Paul Wolfowiz, Elliot Abrams, Colin Powell, John Negroponte, Iraq, Iraq War, George Bush, George W Bush, Honduras, Margaret Thatcher, Nicaragua,
